Employment
Frequently Asked Questions
Please reach us at
golfshop@juliettefalls.com
if you cannot find an answer to your question.
Is the restaurant open to the public?
Yes, our restaurant & bar is open to the public. As well as our golf course & practice facilities with the purchase of range balls or a tee a time.
What are your restaurant hours?
We serve food every day 9am - 6pm. Dinner on Friday nights 4pm - 8pm.
What are your golf shop hours?
The shop is open from 7AM - 5PM daily.
Do I need to book a tee time in advance?
You are welcome to walk in without a tee time. However, we strongly recommend making one in advance to guarantee you can play at your desired time.
How far in advance can I book a tee time?
You can book a tee time 2 weeks in advance.
How do I make a tee time reservation?
You can reserve a tee time here online or by calling into the shop at 352-522-0309. Yes, we offer discounted rates for seniors and military with valid identification.
What is your cancellation policy?
We require a minimum notice of 48 hours to cancel a tee time. No show fees will apply to those who do not cancel.
Do you offer a senior rate?
There are no senior rates. Our rates can be found under our book a tee time and change daily based on availability.
Do you accept group play, tournaments, and shotgun starts?
We welcome them all. Groups can begin to receive a discount with a minimum of 16 players. Groups of 16 or more or tournaments are all booked by
caylyn.milam@juliettefalls.com
Can non-golfers ride along?
Riders are permitted at our discretion, along with a non-refundable rider's fee that is due at the desk before going out.
What happens if it rains and I can't finish my round?
We issue a rain check for a generated dollar amount based off the number of holes you played. The raincheck can be applied to your next round.
Is golf club sharing permitted?
Each golfer is required to have their own set up clubs when playing the course.
Are outside food and beverages allowed?
No outside alcohol is permitted anywhere on the property and violators will be asked to leave without refund.
Is there a dress code?
A tidy standard of dress is required on the course & practice facilities at all times. Guests not complying may be asked to change or leave the premise. Unacceptable clothing while on the practice facilities and course include: denim, baggy pants/shorts, swim trunks, tank tops, spiked golf shoes, open toe shoes, non-collar shirts. No spiked shoes are permitted on the course at any time
What is the expected pace of play?
Our course is rated for 4 hours and 20 minutes, rangers monitor and enforce.
Do you offer golf lessons?
Golf lessons are available by appointment through Lon Kinney at 317-691-3182.
Can I play alone or will I be paired with other players?
Anyone playing as a single or a twosome will be paired up when we are able to.
Can our group play as a fivesome?
No we do not permit more than four golfers per tee time.
Do you have a driving range or practice area?
We have a chipping, putting and driving range for our practice facilities. Range balls must be purchased in the golf shop beforehand to use these facilities.
Are rental clubs available?
Yes, we do have basic rental clubs available.
Is there a beverage cart on the golf course?
Yes, we have a beverage cart that serves beer, wine, liquor, sodas, water, sports drinks and snacks.
Do you have locker rooms and shower facilities?
There are no locker room facilities here, just restrooms and fitting rooms.
Do you offer course reciprocals or PGA rates?
We do not offer course reciprocal or PGA rates/discounts.
Do you offer a senior rate?
There are no senior rates. Our rates can be found under our book a tee time and change daily based on availability.
Are kids allowed to play golf?
Juniors are allowed to play the course and are offered a junior rate after 12:30pm. Please be advised juniors are still required to keep pace so we recommend playing later in the day.
